channel.title: Mandala maker v 6.95
channel.description:
this is one project i been working on since about 1/24/2011 and i got far on this and im at the point where i might quit so imma post here see what you ppl think about it please post if you like it but please dont flame or tell me something like "this sucks" or "you failed " or somthing because im still new at this and this is one of the best things i made :)
credits are litterally in the program on its own button
just to let you know you cannot use regular notepad to view this or it will be all clumped up in a giant cluster so sorry to advertise but i use this program called "notepad++" it uses alot of different computer languages and sorts them out heres a picture of what i mean in a smaller text
sorry in advance the picture will be big
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mevhuq.png[/img]
anyways here is the lastest version of it in an attack ment and here is some pictures of it in action
file menu VVVVVVV
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/313mxbt.png[/img]
cursor menu VVVVVVVVV
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ytvbie.png[/img]
tool menu VVVVVVV
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/a9n2h.png[/img]
math bots menu VVVVVVVVVVVV
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2e22rk9.png[/img]
games menu VVVVVVVVVV
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1193wqg.png[/img]
and here are some other screen shots of what it can do :)
heres 2 that i did using the tube and rectangular illusion together.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2wpl101.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2413t35.png[/img]
heres a cool one i did called "make-all-a-tube-illusion" in one of my favorite shapes
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/qzlmqp.png[/img]
heres some that i did on here using the symmety feature
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2wlsgt4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2zzqm4x.png[/img]
enjoy i posted the files in an attackment incase you dont like the certain posting sites i see alot of ppl say

item.title: Mandala maker v 6.95
item.dc:creator: @JKOK JKOK
item.description:
@JKOK wrote:

m.dog311:

It’s pretty cool. However, I would suggest dropping notepad++ and getting an IDE. They make things a lot better Also, I’m looking through the code, and why are Deck and Card in there?

its for the game of highLow because i thought that mandalaMaker.java was big enough(you can tell by how many .class files it made)

Read full topic

item.title: Mandala maker v 6.95
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

It’s pretty cool. However, I would suggest dropping notepad++ and getting an IDE. They make things a lot better Also, I’m looking through the code, and why are Deck and Card in there?

item.title: Mandala maker v 6.95
item.dc:creator: @JKOK JKOK
item.description:
@JKOK wrote:

Davidi2:

You should really work on the menus, group similar things together

ya i should but i did all but file and control in alpabetocal orderbut forgot to do that with the combat game on the game menu if that makes it better to understand

Read full topic
